general.dataInCloud: Data saved in Browsers storage and synced with other devices

settings.name: Settings
settings.warnAboutPassword: Warn to encrypt credentials before saving

savedCredentials.name: Credentials
savedCredentials.warnAndConfirmAboutPassword: Are you sure want to save without encrypting credentials?

step1.generalTitle: It is advised not to keep private date on computer or sticky notes.
step1.instruction: Before saving credentials, consider pros and cons:
step1.instruction1: Does unwanted people has free access to your computer?
step1.instruction2: Does your computer has viruses or malware?
step1.instruction3: Do you use updated operational system and supported browser version?

step2.instruction1: Do not enter „Smart-ID“ PIN codes and do not approve operations or logins to bank, if you are not logging in or performing any actions.
step2._instruction2: Netvirtinkite operacijų ar prisijungimų prie interneto banko ar programėls, kurių patys neinicijavote.
step2.instruction3: When „Smart-ID“ and mobile signature make sure, that control code, displayed in app and on internet bank, are matching.
step2.instruction4: More sucurity advices can be found here

step3.instruction1: This extenssion works only on official banks pages.
step3.instruction2: If visiting or opening fake bank webpages, e.g. https://xxx-bankas.lt, this extension will not automatically fill in fields and won't try to login to bank.
step3.instruction3: Credentials can be saved either in current computer browser storage, or syncronized between same user different devices browsers.
step3.instruction4: No credentials are send or saved outside of computer, unless data needs to be syncronized. In this case, credentials are saved together with another browser data in Google servers.

step4.autoFillIn: Credentials fields are automatically filled in.
step4.autoSignIn: If credentials are filled in, login to bank is initiated.
step4.storageType: Credentials sre stored in current browser, or sycronyzed with another devices.
step4.fancyLayout: Logins are shown either as grid, or as cards.
step4.warnAboutPassword: If credentials are not encrypted, warning will popup before saving.

step5.importFromBrowser: Extract credentials from internet bank input fields and copies them to extension window.
step5.fillInCredentials: Fills in internet bank input fields with selected credentials.
